sentence: In early trading on Wednesday, shares of Intel Corp ( INTC ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 3.0%.
Year to date, Intel Corp has lost about 10.1% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Procter & Gamble ( PG ), trading down 0.9%.
Procter & Gamble is lower by about 11.3% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Coca-Cola ( KO ), trading down 0.7%, and General Electric ( GE ), trading up 1.2% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
